actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to require recipients of Federal aid to higher education to provide senior citizens with access, on a space available basis, to already scheduled courses and programs.
short_title: Senior Citizen Higher Education Opportunity Act

summary.text: Senior Citizen Higher Education Opportunity Act - Requires recipients of Federal aid to higher education, under the Higher Education Act, to provide senior citizens 60 years of age or older with access, on a space-available basis, to already scheduled courses and programs as a condition of eligibility to continue receiving Federal funds.

titles.title: Senior Citizen Higher Education Opportunity Act
A bill to require recipients of Federal aid to higher education to provide senior citizens with access, on a space available basis, to already scheduled courses and programs.
